import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {fetchMovie} from '../../actions/searchActions' class Movie extends Component { componentDidMount(){ this.props.fetchMovie(this.props.match.params.id) } render() { return (
Name Item Name Item Price
Alvin Eclair $0.87
Alan Jellybean $3.76
Jonathan Lollipop $7.00
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ loading: state.movies.loading, movie: state.movies.movie }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {fetchMovie})(Movie);
